snippet.title: Stack Columns (1994, Arcade) - Full Longplay (Hardest)[1080p60]
snippet.description:
When you compare this game with Columns II [ https://youtu.be/8MYIyJD7YFY ] and Columns III [ https://youtu.be/DtDZdvN-qGA ], I think you'd say this game is closer to Columns 2½...

Stack Columns feature even more advanced AI compared to Columns III, also feature a slightly altered scoring and attacking mechanics.

I Also have a feeling that this game has a hidden "Margin Time" feature, similar to one seen later in Puyo Puyo Tsu, where the later the match drags on, each match made will score more chips.
————————————————————————————
— Arcade Originals —
Columns 2 — https://youtu.be/8MYIyJD7YFY

Columns 3 EN — https://youtu.be/DtDZdvN-qGA
Columns 3 JP — https://youtu.be/D_fGQpJ-XdQ
Columns 3 (Bad Ending) — https://youtu.be/zdXF_rUKxFQ

Stack Columns — You are here

Sakura Taisen Columns  — No videos yet


— Home Console Releases —
Columns 3 (Take 1) — https://youtu.be/gMN0uOs3oms
Columns 3 (Take 2) — https://youtu.be/v1-lfWA6H3E

Magic Jewelry — https://youtu.be/somwZMO1WV4
Magic Jewelry 2 — https://youtu.be/jzdI-OrjUV4

Dossun Ganseki Battle — No videos yet

————————————————————————————
You call THAT an ending?!
